title: Project OMEGA: S-Expression Semantic Compression
description: Transform MU from code describer to pure intent transmitter using Lisp S-expressions with dynamic macro compression. Targets: 3-5x token reduction, unified data representation, prompt cache optimization, LLM-native parsing. See docs/prd/PROJECT_OMEGA_IMPLEMENTATION.md

title: Add CLI --format omega option for context
description: Update CLI to support 'mu kernel context "question" --format omega' for OMEGA compressed context output. Also add 'mu kernel export . --format omega' for macro-compressed export.

title: F1: Task-Aware Context (mu_task_context) - Curated context bundles
Implement OmegaContextExtractor class
description: Create OmegaContextExtractor class wrapping SmartContextExtractor. Implement extract(), extract_for_task(), _synthesize_macros(), _select_macros_for_context(), _generate_seed(), _generate_body(), _count_tokens() methods. Use tiktoken for token counting.

title: Implement MacroSynthesizer.synthesize()
description: Implement synthesize() method that queries PatternDetector, analyzes patterns, generates MacroDefinitions. Also implement _analyze_pattern(), _extract_variable_parts(), _calculate_token_savings(), get_applicable_macros() helper methods.

title: Register LispExporter in ExportManager
description: Update src/mu/kernel/export/base.py get_default_manager() to register LispExporter. Format name: 'lisp', extension: '.mulisp'.

title: MUQL: Validate and fix CONTAINS/IN/GROUP BY parser bugs
Daemon: Add semantic search endpoint POST /search
F7: Why Layer (mu_why) - Git history analysis for code rationale
F10: Code Templates (mu_generate) - Pattern-based boilerplate generation
Write OMEGA integration tests
description: Create tests/integration/test_omega_integration.py with TestOmegaIntegration. Tests: MU codebase compression, MCP tool integration, CLI export lisp, CLI context omega, roundtrip parse.

title: Create OmegaConfig and OmegaManifest models
description: Create src/mu/kernel/context/omega.py with OmegaConfig (max_tokens, header_budget_ratio, include_synthesized, max_synthesized_macros, enable_prompt_cache_optimization, fallback_to_sigils) and OmegaManifest (version, codebase, commit, core/standard/synthesized_macros lists) dataclasses.

title: Create MacroDefinition and MacroTier models
description: Add to src/mu/intelligence/models.py: MacroTier enum (CORE, STANDARD, SYNTHESIZED), MacroDefinition dataclass with name, tier, signature, description, pattern_source, frequency, expansion_template, token_savings. Include to_lisp_def(), apply(), to_dict() methods.

title: Create OmegaResult model
description: Add OmegaResult dataclass with seed (header), body (payload), manifest, macros_used, token accounting (seed_tokens, body_tokens, total_tokens, original_tokens, compression_ratio), nodes_included, extraction_stats. Include full_output property and to_dict().

title: Write OmegaContextExtractor unit tests
description: Create tests/unit/test_omega_context.py with TestOmegaContextExtractor. Tests: basic extraction, seed/body separation, compression ratio vs sigils, token budget respected, manifest generation, cache optimization ordering.

title: Create SynthesisResult model
description: Add SynthesisResult dataclass to models.py with macros list, total_patterns_analyzed, patterns_converted, estimated_compression, synthesis_time_ms. Include get_header() and to_dict() methods. Header should order macros by tier for prompt cache optimization.

title: F2: Pattern Library (mu_patterns) - Auto-detect codebase patterns
Create MacroSynthesizer class
description: Create src/mu/intelligence/synthesizer.py with MacroSynthesizer class. Constants: MAX_SYNTHESIZED_MACROS=5, MIN_PATTERN_FREQUENCY=10, MIN_TOKEN_SAVINGS_PER_INSTANCE=5, MIN_NET_SAVINGS=50. Include STANDARD_MACROS dict with api, component, hook, test, model, service, repo macros.

title: Run compression benchmarks
description: Create tests/benchmark/test_omega_compression.py. Benchmarks: compression vs sigils, compression with macros, token density. Run on MU codebase itself. Target: 3-5x token reduction.

title: Write LispExporter unit tests
description: Create tests/unit/test_lisp_exporter.py with TestLispExporter class. Tests: empty graph, single module, class with methods, function params, inheritance, decorators, escape chars, pretty print, max depth truncation.

title: MUQL: Fix DESCRIBE functions returning empty names
F3: Change Validator (mu_validate) - Pre-commit pattern validation
Add MCP tools: mu_context_omega, mu_export_lisp, mu_macros
description: Update src/mu/mcp/server.py to add three new MCP tools: mu_context_omega (OMEGA compressed context), mu_export_lisp (raw S-expr export), mu_macros (list available macros for codebase). Follow existing MCP tool patterns.

title: Implement S-expr conversion methods
description: Implement _module_to_sexpr, _class_to_sexpr, _function_to_sexpr, _escape_string, _format_sexpr methods in LispExporter. Handle params as name:type format, :bases/:attrs/:decorators keywords, async/static variants.

title: F8: Natural Language MUQL (mu_ask) - NL to MUQL translation
F9: Diff Reviewer (mu_review_diff) - Semantic diff with pattern validation
Update documentation for OMEGA
description: Update CLAUDE.md files with OMEGA commands and usage. Add src/mu/kernel/context/CLAUDE.md section for OmegaContextExtractor. Update root CLAUDE.md with new CLI commands.

title: Add CLI --format lisp option
description: Update src/mu/commands/kernel/export.py to support --format lisp option. Should work with 'mu kernel export . --format lisp'.

title: F5: Proactive Warnings (mu_warn) - Impact, staleness, security alerts
Write MacroSynthesizer unit tests
description: Create tests/unit/test_macro_synthesizer.py. Test classes: TestMacroDefinition (to_lisp_def, apply_simple, apply_with_list, apply_with_spaces), TestMacroSynthesizer (empty patterns, api pattern, component pattern, max limit, min frequency filter, token savings calc, break-even filter).

title: Context extraction: Tune embedding similarity threshold for short queries
Create LispExporter class
description: Create src/mu/kernel/export/lisp.py with LispExporter class that converts MUbase graph data to strict S-expressions. Core forms: module, class, defn, data, const. Include LispExportOptions dataclass with include_header, macros, pretty_print, max_depth options.

title: MUQL: Implement FIND queries (CALLING, INHERITING, etc)
F4: Related Changes (mu_related) - Suggest files that change together
CLI: Fix mu agent query 'Error: None' output bug
